About.intro:
Funded For You is an independent platform specializing in providing in-depth reviews and comparisons of proprietary trading firms (Prop Firms).
The platform aims to offer users general information to help them understand the nature of funded trading accounts and how prop firms operate.
We do not provide funded accounts, manage trading programs, act as a broker, or offer investment advice. Our role is strictly limited to presenting information, analysis, and comparisons for educational and informational purposes only.
About.visionText: To become the most trusted Arabic reference in the funded accounts industry, and a reliable source that traders can depend on to understand prop firms and their offerings before making any decisions.
missionPoints: To explain how funded trading accounts work in a clear and simplified manner
To provide accurate and up-to-date informational content about prop firms and their conditions
To help traders objectively compare available options
To reduce the spread of misleading information and promote credibility and transparency in this field
whatWeOfferPoints: Objective and detailed analysis of proprietary trading firms
In-depth evaluations of the strengths and weaknesses of prop firms based on real user experiences
Clear comparisons between firms, accounts, rules, and pricing
Exclusive offers: special benefits and discounts in collaboration with funded trading firms
Continuous updates: keeping users informed about the latest developments in the funded trading industry
Information sourced from references we believe to be reliable at the time of publication, without guaranteeing ongoing accuracy or completeness
About.commitmentText:
We are committed to delivering a trustworthy experience that respects the trader's time and effort. All of our content and services are designed to serve serious traders, with a strong commitment to trust, transparency, and professionalism.
We do not sell funded accounts or operate trading programs. Our role is solely to provide information with neutrality and transparency, ensuring that all content is based on reliable sources and professional analysis that serves the trader's best interest first.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: Welcome to FundedForYou.com (the “Platform”). Your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and we are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices for collecting, using, disclosing, and safeguarding your data when you interact with our website and services. By using our website and services, you confirm that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with its terms, please refrain from using our platform. This policy applies to all users of fundedforyou.com, regardless of location. It governs the processing of personal and non-personal data collected through your interactions with our website, services, or affiliated communications. Throughout this document, references to “we,” “us,” “our,” or the “site” refer to fundedforyou.com. Please note that this Privacy Policy is supplemented by our comprehensive Terms & Conditions.
introPoints: What information (including personal data) we collect and why
How we collect and process your information
How your data is used and shared
Your rights over your data (e.g., access, correction, or deletion)
How to contact us for questions or concerns

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: We collect personal and non-personal information to provide you with the best possible experience on the platform. The types of information we collect include:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: Personal information is any data that identifies or can be used to identify you directly or indirectly. This may include:
points: Your name, email address, phone number, and account details when you register on the Platform.

If you register on our Platform using Google Single Sign-On (SSO), we will automatically receive your Google account email address. This email will be used both for account creation and for enrollment in our communications list, including our weekly newsletter and updates. You can opt out of non-essential communications at any time.
Professional or financial details, such as trading experience or prop firm preferences, if provided during your use of the Platform.
Any information you voluntarily share with us, such as when you contact us or participate in surveys.

nonPersonal.title: Non-Personal Information
nonPersonal.content: Non-personal information is collected automatically and does not directly identify you. This may include:
points: Device and browser details (e.g., type, version, and operating system).
IP address and geolocation data (where permissible by law).
Website usage data, including pages visited, time spent, and clickstream patterns.

analytics.title: Analytics and Session Recording
analytics.content: We may use analytics and session-recording tools to understand how users interact with the Platform and to improve our product, diagnose technical issues, and detect fraud. These tools may collect information about your interactions with the Platform, including page and screen views, clicks, mouse movements, navigation paths, timestamps, console logs, events (feature usage), and device and browser details (type, version, operating system, screen size). When you are logged in, session recordings may be associated with your account identifier to help troubleshoot account-specific issues. We do not intentionally collect payment card numbers, full passwords, or other highly sensitive authentication data. We will only enable session recording for users in jurisdictions that require explicit consent after the user has provided affirmative, documented consent. For users who opt out, we will not record session replays or set related tracking cookies.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. These technologies may collect information about your interactions with our website, such as your preferences and session details.

consent.title: Consent for Session Recording and Analytics
consent.content: Where required by law (including for users in the European Economic Area and the UK), we will obtain your explicit opt-in consent before enabling session recording or analytics that may capture page content. You may change or withdraw consent at any time via the cookie settings, your account settings, or by contacting privacy@fundedforyou.com. Consent decisions are recorded with timestamps to demonstrate compliance.

thirdPartySources.title: Third-Party Sources
thirdPartySources.content: We may also receive information about you from third-party sources, such as social media platforms if you engage with us there, or referral and advertising partners when you access our Platform through their links. We ensure that any data collected is handled in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Data Collection
purpose.intro: We collect and use your information for the following purposes, in accordance with applicable laws and your preferences:

provide.title: To Provide Our Services
provide.content: Facilitate your use of the Platform, including matching you with suitable proprietary trading firms (prop firms). Process your registration, account setup, and any preferences you submit.

improve.title: To Improve Your Experience
improve.content: Personalize the Platform and our communications to align with your preferences and interests. Analyze user behavior to improve website functionality, user experience, and overall performance.

communicate.title: To Communicate with You
communicate.content: Respond to your inquiries, requests, or feedback. Send service-related updates, including changes to this Privacy Policy or our Terms & Conditions.

marketing.title: For Marketing and Promotions
marketing.content: Send you newsletters, promotions, or other content that may interest you (only with your consent, where required). If you register via Google SSO, you will be automatically enrolled to receive our newsletter and updates based on legitimate interests and your acceptance of this Privacy Policy and our Terms & Conditions. In all cases, you may unsubscribe at any time. Display targeted advertisements on our Platform or third-party websites based on your preferences.

compliance.title: For Compliance and Legal Obligations
compliance.content: Comply with applicable laws and regulations, including those governing data protection, fraud prevention, and cybersecurity. Respond to legal requests or enforce our rights under our Terms & Conditions.

protect.title: To Protect Our Platform and Users
protect.content: Detect and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activity. Safeguard the integrity and security of our Platform and services.

purpose.closing: We will only process your personal data for the purposes outlined above and in compliance with applicable legal bases, such as your consent, contractual necessity, or our legitimate interests. If we need to use your data for any purpose not specified here, we will notify you and obtain your consent where required.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing Data
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal information based on the following legal bases, as applicable under relevant data protection laws such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: When you voluntarily provide information or opt-in to receive marketing communications, we process your data based on your consent. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.

contractual.title: Contractual Necessity
contractual.content: Certain data is required to fulfill our contractual obligations to you, such as providing access to our services or facilitating matches with proprietary trading firms.

legal.title: Legal Obligations
legal.content: We may process your data to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal requests, such as tax, fraud prevention, or compliance with data protection laws.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests
legitimate.content: We may process your information to pursue our legitimate business interests, provided that such processing does not override your rights and freedoms. Legitimate interests include improving and personalizing our services, ensuring the security and integrity of the Platform, and conducting business analytics and research. When you create an account through Google SSO, we process your email address for the dual purpose of account management and delivering newsletters and updates. This processing is based on our legitimate interest in providing you with service-related communications and relevant content. You may opt out of receiving newsletters without affecting your access to the Platform.

vital.title: Vital Interests or Public Interest
vital.content: In rare cases, we may process your data to protect your vital interests or the public interest, such as preventing harm or responding to emergencies.

legalBasis.closing: We ensure that any processing of your personal data is conducted in compliance with applicable data protection laws. If you have any concerns or questions about the legal bases for processing your data, you may contact us at privacy@fundedforyou.com.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share your data with third parties under the following circumstances:

withConsent.title: With Your Consent
withConsent.content: We will share your information with third parties when you have provided explicit consent for such sharing.

providers.title: Service Providers and Partners
providers.content: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers or partners who assist us in operating the Platform, providing services, or conducting business activities (e.g., payment processors, IT support, hosting providers, or analytics services).

legal.title: Legal Compliance and Law Enforcement
legal.content: We may disclose your information if required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or enforceable governmental requests. This includes sharing data to protect the rights, property, or safety of fundedforyou.com, our users, or others.

business.title: Business Transfers
business.content: In the event of a merger, acquisition, reorganization, or sale of assets, your data may be transferred to the acquiring entity or its advisors. We will notify you of such changes as required by applicable laws.

aggregated.title: Aggregated or De-Identified Data
aggregated.content: We may share aggregated or de-identified data that cannot be used to identify you with third parties for research, marketing, or analytical purposes.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention and Storage
retention.intro: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

period.title: Retention Period
period.content: We retain your account data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our services. We may retain data related to transactions or communications for record-keeping, compliance, and audit purposes. We may also retain certain data to meet legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce our agreements.

analytics.title: Analytics & Session Recording Retention
analytics.content: We retain analytics events and session recordings only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this Policy and to comply with applicable law. Anonymous sessions (non-logged-in) are retained for 30 days then permanently deleted or irreversibly anonymized. Logged-in user sessions are retained for 90 days by default. Exception for security/fraud investigations: recordings required for a validated investigation may be retained up to 12 months; such exceptions are recorded, justified, and periodically reviewed. Recordings will be purged automatically according to these schedules; if you request deletion of your personal data we will delete or anonymize session recordings associated with your account in accordance with this retention schedule and applicable law.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.content: If you request deletion of your personal information, we will remove or anonymize your data unless retention is required for legitimate business purposes, compliance with legal obligations, or dispute resolution.

storage.title: Storage Locations
storage.content: Your data may be stored and processed in the country where you reside, or in other countries where our service providers or partners operate. We implement safeguards to ensure that your data is protected regardless of location.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We use industry-standard technical, administrative, and physical measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, no system can be 100% secure, and we encourage you to take precautions when sharing personal information online.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
rights.intro: We respect your rights regarding your personal information and provide mechanisms for you to exercise control over your data.

access.title: Access and Portability
access.content: You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you. Where applicable, we will provide a copy of your data in a portable and commonly used format.

correction.title: Correction
correction.content: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.content: You may request the deletion of your personal data, subject to legal or contractual obligations that require us to retain certain information.

restriction.title: Restriction of Processing
restriction.content: You have the right to restrict how we process your data in certain circumstances, such as if you contest the accuracy of the data or object to its processing.

session.title: Session Recording Control and DSARs
session.content: You may opt out of session recording and analytics at any time using the cookie/consent manager or by contacting privacy@fundedforyou.com. For users in the EEA/UK, session recording will only be enabled after explicit opt-in consent. If you submit a request to access, correct, or delete your data (DSAR), we will locate session recordings tied to your account and provide them or remove them in accordance with applicable law and the retention schedule. If recordings contain other users’ data, we will take reasonable steps to redact third-party content.

objection.title: Objection to Processing
objection.content: You may object to our processing of your data for direct marketing purposes or based on legitimate interests.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: If we process your data based on your consent, you can withdraw your consent at any time. This will not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out before withdrawal.

complaints.title: Filing Complaints
complaints.content: If you believe we have violated your data protection rights, you have the right to file a complaint with the relevant data protection authority in your jurisdiction.

optout.title: Opt-Out of Marketing
optout.content: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by clicking the “unsubscribe” link in any email or contacting us directly.

cookies.title: Managing Cookies
cookies.content: You can manage your preferences for cookies and similar technologies through your browser settings.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.intro: We are committed to safeguarding your personal information and take appropriate technical, administrative, and physical measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or disclosure.

practices.title: Security Practices
practices.content: We use encryption protocols (e.g., SSL) to protect sensitive data transmitted via the Platform. We restrict access to personal data to authorized personnel who are subject to strict confidentiality agreements.

accessControls.title: Access Controls for Session Recordings
accessControls.content: Access to session recordings is restricted to authorized personnel for legitimate business reasons (product development, debugging, fraud prevention). Access is governed by least-privilege role-based access controls (RBAC), protected by multi-factor authentication, and subject to audit logging and periodic review.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: While we take extensive measures to protect your data, you also play a critical role in its security. Ensure your account credentials remain confidential and avoid sharing sensitive information over unsecured channels.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: Despite our efforts, no system can be entirely secure. If you suspect any security breach or unauthorized access to your account, notify us immediately at privacy@fundedforyou.com.

thirdParty.title: 8. Third-Party Links and Services
thirdParty.content: Our Platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. This Privacy Policy does not apply to third-party platforms, and we are not responsible for their privacy practices. If you click on links or interact with third-party services, their privacy policies will govern the collection and use of your data. We encourage you to review their policies before sharing any information. Some pages on our Platform may include embedded content from third parties (e.g., videos, social media widgets). Interacting with such content may result in data being shared with the respective third party.

children.title: 9. Children’s Privacy
children.content: Our Platform is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately at privacy@fundedforyou.com. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 18, we will promptly delete it from our systems.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content: As a global platform, your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your location, including countries that may not have the same level of data protection laws as your jurisdiction. We implement safeguards, such as standard contractual clauses or equivalent mechanisms, to ensure that your data is protected during international transfers. By using our Platform, you acknowledge and consent to the transfer, storage, and processing of your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. Significant changes to this policy will be communicated via email (if you have provided it) or a notice on our Platform. All changes will become effective immediately upon posting unless otherwise stated. Continued use of the Platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us using privacy@fundedforyou.com.

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.intro:
These Terms and Conditions govern the User's participation in and/or use of certain services or features of FundedForYou.com (the "FFY Platform"). By using FFY Platform, the User agrees to be bound by these terms of service (the "Terms and Conditions"). The integral part of these Terms and Conditions is FFY Platform Privacy Policy. FFY Platform privacy policy regarding processing of personal data is available at FFY Platform's website and is incorporated by reference into this Agreement as well as it is a part of these Terms and Conditions.

We provide an online resource dedicated to centralizing and simplifying access to information about proprietary trading firms ("prop firms"). The Platform's mission is to provide traders with comprehensive, verified, and comparative content about prop firms, empowering them to make informed decisions that align with their individual needs.

It is important to note that we do not provide any opinions, recommendations, or endorsements regarding any specific prop firm. The Platform is committed to furnishing impartial and verifiable information to support traders in their decision-making processes.

acceptance.title: 1. Your Acceptance of this Agreement
acceptance.content:
These Terms and Conditions are entered into by and between You and Funded For You. The following terms and conditions govern your access to and use of fundedforyou.com.

Please read the Terms and Conditions carefully before you start to use the Website. By using the Website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

By accessing and using this Website, you:
points: Accept and agree to be bound and comply with these Terms and Conditions.
Represent and warrant that you are the legal age of majority under applicable law to form a binding contract with us.
Agree if you access the Website from a jurisdiction where it is not permitted, you do so at your own risk.

scope.title: 2. Scope of Services
scope.content:
We provide a comprehensive platform designed to inform and empower traders in understanding proprietary trading firms by presenting impartial and well-researched content.

The Platform includes a user review section where traders can share their experiences and insights. Users can also report payout disputes by submitting evidence of alleged unjustified payout denials.

We explicitly clarify that We do not:
notProvideList: Endorsement of any trading firms, strategies, or financial products

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content:
When creating an account on our Platform, Users must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials.

By registering for an account using Google Single Sign-On (SSO), you acknowledge and agree that your email address provided through Google will automatically be added to our communications list.

The Platform reserves the right to verify the accuracy of registration information and take appropriate action in response to account-related concerns. Specific grounds for account action may include:
reasons: Provision of false or misleading information

contentGuidelines.title: 4. Content Guidelines
contentGuidelines.userContentText: Our Platform is dedicated to fostering a transparent and constructive environment for Users to share authentic insights and experiences. Users generating content through reviews or discussions must provide evidence-based, honest assessments that reflect genuine experiences. All content must adhere to strict standards of integrity, prohibiting false, misleading, defamatory, or malicious material.
contentGuidelines.platformContentText: The Platform retains comprehensive rights to manage all content within its ecosystem, including the ability to modify, edit, remove, or block content that violates guidelines. While we strive to provide a robust information resource, all content is presented on an 'as-is' basis, with no guarantees of accuracy, completeness, or reliability.

listing.title: 5. Prop Firm Listing Methodology
listing.content: We employ a rigorous and comprehensive methodology for listing and evaluating proprietary trading firms, designed to provide Users with reliable and transparent information. The listing process involves extensive due diligence that systematically assesses firms across multiple critical dimensions.\n\nThe Platform offers a structured mechanism for users to suggest and recommend proprietary trading firms for potential evaluation. Each submission undergoes a systematic review process with independent verification.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: Our Platform and its entire digital ecosystem, including all content, design, graphics, text, software, and branding, are the exclusive intellectual property of our organization. Users are granted a limited, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the Platform's content strictly for personal, non-commercial purposes.\n\nAny unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or commercial use is expressly prohibited. We retain the right to pursue legal action to protect our intellectual property, including seeking injunctive relief and monetary damages for any infringement.

commercial.title: 7. Commercial Disclosure
commercial.content: We participate in affiliate programs with certain proprietary trading firms listed on the Platform. This means we may earn commission from proprietary trading firms if a user purchases a prop firm challenge or service through an affiliate link or code.\n\nWe explicitly and unequivocally declare that any affiliate commissions received do not influence, compromise, or alter the objectivity of our content, reviews, or firm assessments. Users are solely responsible for their independent decision-making and are strongly advised to conduct their personal due diligence.

contentChar.title: 8. Content Characteristics
contentChar.content: The news and informational content provided on the Website is intended solely for informational purposes only. We make no representation or warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, reliability, or timeliness of any content. The content is presented 'as-is' without any implied or express warranties.

prohibited.title: 9. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: We uphold a zero-tolerance policy for actions that compromise the integrity, security, or collaborative spirit of our community. Users are strictly prohibited from engaging in conduct that undermines the platform's purpose, violates laws, or harms others.\n\nThis includes manipulating platform mechanisms for personal gain, violating intellectual property rights, or engaging in illegal activities, harassment, hate speech, and sharing offensive content. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts without notice for any violations.

disclaimer.title: 10. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: THE PLATFORM PROVIDES INFORMATIONAL CONTENT RELATED TO PROPRIETARY TRADING FIRMS SOLELY FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES. USERS EXPLICITLY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT ALL CONTENT IS PRESENTED WITHOUT ANY GUARANTEE OF ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS, OR CURRENT RELEVANCE.\n\nWE DO NOT PROVIDE FINANCIAL ADVICE, INVESTMENT RECOMMENDATIONS, OR ENDORSEMENTS. THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED ON AN 'AS-IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' BASIS, WITH NO WARRANTIES REGARDING RELIABILITY, ACCURACY, OR CONTINUOUS ACCESSIBILITY.

limitation.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In jurisdictions where limitations of liability are permitted, our total cumulative liability to any user for all claims arising out of or relating to the use of the platform shall not exceed USD $50.\n\nSome jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of certain damages. In such cases, our liability will be limited to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the platform, its owners, affiliates, and employees from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising from your use of the platform, your violation of these Terms, or infringement of any rights of a third party.

privacy.title: 13. Privacy
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data responsibly and securely. By using the platform, you acknowledge and agree to the collection, use, and processing of your information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.\n\nOur Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, store, and protect your data, including the use of analytics and session-recording technologies. If you have any questions, please refer to our Privacy Policy or contact us directly.

termination.title: 14. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the platform at our sole discretion, with or without prior notice, for any of the following reasons:
reasons: Violation of these Terms and Conditions or any applicable law
Engagement in prohibited activities or conduct detrimental to the platform or its users
Misuse of the platform, including attempts to disrupt or interfere with its functionality

governing.title: 15. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Dubai, United Arab Emirates without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

contact.title: 16. Contact Information
contact.content: For inquiries, concerns, or communication regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:\nsupport@fundedforyou.com
